Summary: Orbs in triangle formation and orbs red/orange.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Thetford Mines
There were no other sightings in Thetford Mines on or around June 8th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthe 8 june 2010, 2 days after the 6 june 2010 world extraterrestrial contact event, i went back to the same location to try make peacefull contact with extraterrestrials beings. after the sunset a triangle formation of orb appeared in the sky. a orange\red orb appeared. and slowly a strange but magnificient red\orange orb raised above the top of the hill. some civil aircrafts rushed into the direction of those orbs. i slowly leaved the location... the red\orange orb slowly rose up in the sky, and others orbs moved into my direction. i trying to make peacefull contact with those visitors, because i think they really can help us to build a better civilization.... and maybe fix the oil spill in the gulf of mexico....
